name: Sponsors lounge spot
desc: This is the perfect opportunity for your team to meet all the great product people in the room – this isn’t a boring booth. We’re keeping things casual with comfy sofas and a dedicated area in the ‘Lounge’. We’ll be working with you to ensure you get everything you need to make your presence shine and get the most of the day/conversations.

name: Promotional item or flyer in goodie bag
Sponsored attendee experience
desc: Very twittable branded cupcakes, a special cocktail, a live performance show... There is no crazy idea, and we'd love to hear what you have in mind!

name: Dedicated email to all attendees pre or post event
